titleStmt.title: Six sermons preached before the late incomparable princess Queen Mary, at White-Hall with several additions and large annotations to the discourse of justification by faith / by George Bright ...
titleStmt.author: G. B. (George Bright), d. 1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.H. for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: "Imprimatur. Carolus Alston, R.P.D. Hen. Episc. Lond. à Sacris. Febr. 12. 1694/5"--Opposite t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
